entry.title: 2 days per month time account
entry.content:
Hi,

I tried to calculate 2 days per month being added to the time account type, its monthly based.

Put a cap on the limit:

Days are not being added up to the limit: 20.

Can anyone help with this function? The requirement is to add 2 days monthly up to 20 days on the time account balance.

Thanks in advance,

Sorry for the tag Volker, but if you could take a look @Volker_Ruof and give me your input maybe on a different way to achieve the same result. Thank you.

Best regards,

Daniela P

entry.title: Language Translation in Profile Field values in Employee Central
entry.content:
Hi All


We have a requirement to translate the field values in the Employee Profile to the language in which the employee is logged in.

For example: 

  • The Division value in Job Information is "Field Marketing (114)."
  • In the Division Unit MDF object, the French translation for Division is "Marketing sur le terrain (114)."
  • When this data is synced from Job Information to the Employee Profile (People Profile), the Division value should display as "Marketing sur le terrain (114)" instead of "Field Marketing (114)", if the user is logged in with the French language.
  • Please refer to the attachment.

Can above requirement be achieved?

entry.title: User Position.Recruiter is invalid for R - error: how can I solve this.

Integrating SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Position Management with SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting)

and this error always occurs:  

User Position.Recruiter is invalid for R

I have tried several things but it doesnÂ´t  Create a new Job Requisition from the Position Org Chart. 

 

Thank Community for your help. 

 

Kind regards

entry.title: unable to create Time off in Successfactors Joule in Paid Demo Instance
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

We procured a Paid Demo instance for the Company to explore the scenarios in Joule. But the current system behaviour is not working as expected. The standard use cases provided is not working for Create Spot award, Approve Spot Award, Create Time off and Approve Time off. 

Create And approve time off is working as expected in the UI, and it is a standard configuration and no change is required for Joule. Do we have any other settings to be enabled for time off & spot award. 

Since it is a paid demo, not sure this should be the behaviour. And able to see the simple use cases working in joule for create, change and delete. But w.r.t ESS to MSS none of the use case is working as expected. But it is working in UI, checked all the permissions, IAS and IPS config. 

If anyone came across this scenario, Can you please let me know how to get this fixed. Checked with few of my friends and they raised a ticket and it was fixed by SAP. Being a Paid demo, if anyone knows how to get the support of SAP that will also be helpful. Since unable to raise ticket in Launch pad (Me.sap) due to missing system selection in the drop down.

Regards,

Abhi.

entry.content: I'm working on mapping my document for generation, and one of the fields needs to be mapped to trigger the value for the next month. Could you assist me with how to generate that

entry.title: Calculated columns: How to use TOTEXT for parameter with both string and number values
entry.content:
We are currently trying to set up a calculated column in SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics to determine eligibility for level progression using logic similar to the following
IF([Current Level] = "B3" AND [TIME_IN_LEVEL_MONTHS] >= 50 AND [TOTAL_SENIORITY_MONTHS] >= 150,
"B2",
[Current Level]
)


When referencing the parameter in the formula for [Current Level] , the error appears: Formula could not be computed: Function "=" expects parameters 1 and 2 to be of compatible types (found "Number" vs. "String"). Please complete or rewrite the formula.
--> The current level is recognized sometimes as text (A, A3, A3, ...) and sometimes as numbers (1, 2, 3, ...) which is true, the values can have both type of content.

To work around this, we attempted to use the TOTEXT() function to normalize the data type, but it seems this formula is more designed for dates? e.g. TOTEXT([Current Level#External Name]) like TOTEXT("A") "A" results in '17833043'

 


Could you advise on:

How to consistently treat [Current Level] as a text field in formulas?
Whether thereâs a recommended approach for handling mixed-type fields in People Analytics?

Thank you in advance for your support.



Documentation reviewed:

  • https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PEOPLE_ANALYTICS/dad69084edb947e98ebede671ecd26f0/190ee023528640478551fd4054e183bb.html?locale=en-US&state=PRODUCTION&version=2505
  • https://me.sap.com/notes/3204317

entry.title: Forward propagation not working when importing pay range in Positions.
entry.content:
Hello,

we are encountering an issue where although we have forward propagation turned on, when we import new pay ranges dated retroactively, the forward propagation does not happen. is this normal behavior? anyone knows how to avoid having to update one by one the positions?

 

Thanks

entry.title: Multiple HRBP to 1 user in Learning
entry.content:
Hi,

The customer has a requirement to assign multiple HRBPs to 1 user in learning. Currently they are preparing the user connector template manually to maintain this in LMS. In EC this information is not stored in a custom object. EC is using permission groups and dynamic groups to have multiple HR BPs assigned. 

I am looking for an alternative to automate this process and generate a report for the user connector. Kindly suggest any alternative. Your help is appreciated.

Thanks & regards,

Prachi

entry.title: Create Absence Page
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Is it possible to create custom screen for Create Absence? I created default screen and assigned it to object "Employee Time", but it is not reflected on Create Absence /Request Time Off UI (Quick action or Workbench), it is visible in Workflow page only.

I would need to modify the "Create absence". Custom fields added in Object definition are visible but I need to change the appearance of the screen and add business rules, like in workflow page.

Can you please advise?

Thank you in advance

Gosia

entry.title: Request for Self-Service Payslip Download Access in SAP SuccessFactors

entry.title: ESS permission for document generation template does not show template in RBP
entry.content:
1) Manage permission group->ESS role

2) Manage document generation template-> de-select all-> specific template is not available in dropdown

entry.title: Best practice approach for Automation of pay components(Salary)
entry.content:
Hello All,

Anyone know regarding best practice approach for Automation of pay components( salary structure) instead of rule how we can do ?

entry.title: Unable to Edit a Custom Field under one-time payments
entry.content:
Hello!

We have a requirement to create a custom field under One-Time Payments. The fieldâs visibility is set to "Edit" in the Business Configuration UI. Weâve also assigned an onChange business rule that should make the field editable only when a specific pay component is selected.

To verify the rule behavior, we enabled rule trace, which confirms that the condition is working correctly. When the correct pay component is selected, the rule sets the fieldâs visibility to "both". The trace shows:

Set property 'payComponentNonRecurringModel.payComponentNonRecurring_custom_string1.visibility' to value 'both' in modified object 'custom-string1'

However, in the UI, the field custom-string1 is not editable. It only appears under the âView Empty Fieldsâ section on the right panel, and not in the main editable area.

We recently enabled the latest People Profile, and weâre wondering if thereâs an additional configuration step required to make the field editable and visible in the main UI.

Any inputs are greatly appreciated.

-Swathi

entry.title: Automatic update of custom MDF object data
entry.content:
Hi,

does anyone of you have any experience with updating data in the custom MDF object via Integration Center?

We have the object to calculate data for Loyalty Agreements. All calculations e.g. the monthly cost, amount to be paid etc. are setup as Save Rules in the object definition. 

We would like to have that data updated automatically every day.

Currently, we need to go to each employee, select Loyalty Agreement and save it to recalculate the fields. 

Do you have any idea how it can be resolved?

Thank you in advance!

Aneta

SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central

entry.title: Compound Employee API Query
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a requirement to fetch data from SF Employee compound API based on conditions like last_modified_on >= last run date or employment start date = today or employment end date = today.
Since OR operation is not supported, I tried to call these 3 queries separately, first using condition of last modified date, then employment_end_date and start date (this is a general one as I am not able to do nested query). Then merge all of these together and filter them. But employment_end_date query is giving complete data in the response along with the requested data,if present.
What is the best way to achieve this scenario.
Thanks & Regards,
Keerthana

entry.title: No EP user in Integration Center Job Output
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We are using EmpEmployment entity in Integration Center Job (no filter is used) to extract data .It has come to our attention that contractors are not being included in the output of the IC job.

For contractors, only basic user import is performed, and no other data is available for contractors. Kindly clarify whether it is anticipated behavior to omit contractors from this job's output, and if so, could you please explain the rationale behind this?

 

Best Regards.

entry.title: Including multiple Matrix Managers in Performanceâ âUser Does Not Existâ Error Despite Valid USERIDs
entry.content:
Hi all,

Similar to @Maria851  in https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/successfactors-create-job-to-run-importing-matrix-and-custom-managers/qaq-p/14136823 and @SatishPanda  in https://community.sap.com/t5/human-capital-management-q-a/can-we-assign-two-matrix-manager-to-a-single-employee-in-system/qaq-p/13639437 

We are trying to import matrix managers using the Import Matrix Manager and Custom Manager Relationships tool in SAP SuccessFactors. The process followed is from documentation https://help.sap.com/docs/successfactors-platform/managing-user-information and using the CSV format with following structure:

USERID,MGR_USERID,RELATIONSHIP,ORG_CHART_DISPLAY,ACTION
1111,2222|3333,EX,TRUE,ADD

Both 1111, 2222and 3333are confirmed as active users in the UDF and visible in the platform. However, I consistently receive this error:

Line number: 1 | Column: MGR_USERID | Cause: The user does not exist in the system.

 

Weâve already:

  • Verified that the USERIDs are active and correctly formatted
  • Ensured the file is UTF-8 encoded
  • Cleaned up any hidden characters or line breaks

Still no success.

Has anyone encountered this before? Could this be related to how the platform validates USERIDs in this tool vs. the UDF? Any insights or workarounds would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

Documentation reviewed:

https://help.sap.com/docs/successfactors-platform/managing-user-information/importing-matrix-and-custom-managers

https://help.sap.com/docs/successfactors-ec-s4-hcm-integration/implementing-data-migration-and-replication-to-employee-central/how-manager-s-user-id-is-updated

3247460 - Matrix manager and HR manager are unable to sync to

From <https://me.sap.com/notes/3247460/E>

2087507 - Data Imports & Exports: Matrix Manager and Custom Manager Import - Displaying Matrix & Custom Manager

From <https://me.sap.com/notes/2087507/E>
